title: Holy crap Darius is so scary with Dead Man's Plate.
body:
He runs around with 455 MS from Mercs and Deadmans 90 bonus, i'm on 355 MS with Kali because I rushed Blade of the Ruined King and Runaan's Hurricane and bought an extra Recurve Bow by accident so nabbed a quick Wit's End (Bear in mind me and morg made the Sivir Rage at level 2 with 3 poke auto combos forcing her to b and she just didn't come back) and Darius is running after me, Auto'ing once for the 90% slow for 1 second and charging a Q I can't get out of range of then popping a W on me after an auto-attack because his dead man's just gives him that much clutch MS and the CC reduc masteries on top of mercs make my E useless and his Dead man's is stacking that fast he can Grab me back to him and then hit another Q and before I can get out of range he's got another W on me and then another Q and ulti and i'm dead.

I can't flash because he can just flash after me.

Darius shows up anywhere and everyone just legs it lmao.

None of the other Juggernauts are this BS lol, Skarner has less CC than this without his ultimate and his ultimate is more for team fights not just 1v5 running through teams and healing and dunking people for insane damage. I mean where is the trade off lol. No one has played Skarner in ranked more than once since 2 weeks after his release - probably because of the nerfs (This is in Gold though) and Darius is still a 100% requested ban and a popular and very strong Champion.

Like Mordekaiser has trouble sticking to people but has some crazy damage but has a huge trade-off in that he can't stick to people, Garen has to trade off having decent CC and Darius just gets the best of everything, plus his synergy with Cleaver applying from his bleeds so he is like an AOE death zone for everyone and splits everyone 100%, Dead man's gives him everything he needs, Titanic Hydra makes him a joke and while his DPS can scale off after this - because of his innate tackiness with later itemisation and his heals on Q's his whole kit makes him a complete nightmare to deal with lmao.

I understand his weaknesses but holy crap he is waaaaaaaaaaaay over powered in a lot of scenarios.

but susan needs work to get that far. Darius just hits q
And you can easily shut Nasus down and win game while he's busy farming.

I usually just pick Vayne if enemy 1st picks him, or will take {{champion:23}}  Top although I'm usually happy with: {{champion:60}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:75}} (Nasus isn't the best against him but I do good with the others, Nasus is sorta in his favour but I usually do good regardless) and Some people will take Vayne top against him but I don't like taking her top because she lacks CC and I think she's over-rated against him because if the Jungler lane sits for him he gets to farm his core items and then becomes problematic and if you have a Yi jungle or a squishy jungler or a devourer Jungler or a Jungler without sustain or huge tankiness they usually wont wanna help you with the enemy lane sitting or even try and harass him if the Jungler doesn't so I don't take Vayne top against - but 9 times out of ten if I see him ill pick her and take her bot, Tryndamere seems to smash him because you can sustain decently and your sustain peaks a bit higher sooner than his and it gives you a lane power edge and by the time he has ult his all ins are pretty much wasted and you have to make big errors to  lose; and Garen vs him is sorta a skill matchup but it favors the darius in a lot of cases so I don't usually do it that much, but if you do get an edge over him he will never make up for it.
Darius and Garen are just cancer, both should be banned without question, if they're not banned, pick them or dodge.
